Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: K. Roberts
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop recently to replace a 6 year old HP.  I didn't have high expectations after reading about the difficulties of Windows 8 and problems with other laptops.The negative:  This Toshiba does not come equipped with a removable battery.  I found it convenient to have extra batteries available with the old laptop.  The battery life is okay with about 3 1/2 hours of simple computer use/internet browsing.  However, the battery does drain when you simply close the screen (it dropped to 60% while closed for 24 hours).The first time I tried to open the optical drive it didn't open.  I had to use a paperclip to manually open it.  Afterwards, it has opened automatically without any problems.The positive:  This laptop is fast.  I'm not a gamer, so I can't say how it does with the latest games, but for everyday computing use it blows my old laptop out of the water.  Webpages and software open quickly.  The computer comes out of sleep mode almost instantly.I was able to install my old software without a hitch.  I am running Windows Office 2000 and QuickBooks 2003 without much difficulty.  I run QB as an administrator to work at its best.The backlit keyboard feature is useful and I like having the 10-key number pad.  The touchpad is easy to use, even without the dedicated right/left buttons.  There are two thin raised bars that help the fingers sense where to click for the respective buttons.The Toshiba feels light, but sturdy.There is little to no noise, much quieter than the old HP I used.  The cooling fan seems to work efficiently as the area where my wrists rest while I type has stayed cool to the touch.Overall, a good laptop for me.  I would have rated it 5 stars had the battery been removable.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: sizatt
Reviews.Content: I love my new laptop. I couldn't be happier. It is taking some getting used to using windows 8, but it will come with time. I love the back light feature on the keyboard. The screen is bright and I love the weight of the laptop, so light to carry.Looking forward to many years with it,

Reviews.Title: not right model
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: it is not as description at all! i just return it back and get refund.i am not sure what happened, but when i received it and found it not the model i want.

Reviews.Title: I like my laptop
Reviews.Author: Sandra Medina
Reviews.Content: I like my laptop bacause is fast . I dont like operatin system I prefer other version because it is version is touch screen

Reviews.Title: Good buy!
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: It does every thing I need it to and more. It is light and fast, lots of storage space on hard drive.

Reviews.Title: The product completly satisfied my spectations
Reviews.Author: German Ariel Romani
Reviews.Content: When I decided to purchase the product, the first thing that I analyze was the component, after that I was happily surprised with the product it self, the format, the wigth and the prestations. It was my first buy but now I will consider this manufacter more serious, when I want to upgrade to a better equipment

Reviews.Title: This laptop will require for you to update your wireless card
Reviews.Author: Oleg L. Frayman
Reviews.Content: Good laptop for a student, last generation processor:Con:  windows 8 is horrible, wireless will require for you to download latest firmware from Toshiba.  This laptop does not have touchscreen making Windows 8 very difficult to use.Thanks
